parts.text:
CLI? HmmðŸ¤§
What other kind of project/library can I work on

Ah, CLI is Command Line Interface, like those lil programs you run in your terminal. Kinda niche for some, def. ðŸ˜¬

Okay, how about this:

*   A library for **super-fast form validation**? Cuz nobody likes writing that boilerplate. ðŸ˜´
*   Or like, a **minimalist animation library** for web stuff that's not GSAP/Framer levels. Just quick pops and fades. âœ¨
Ok nice idea like customize your CMD  ðŸ™‚

Lmao nah, my bad, those were more like general dev/web libs, not specifically for customizing your terminal! ðŸ˜…

But hey, if you're open to more non-CLI stuff, how about:
*   A **fake data generator** (for testing, etc.)
*   A **simple image filter lib** (think like basic IG filters)
*   Or even a **"smart" text formatter** that cleans up code comments or something? ðŸ¤”
Nah I will make a customizable terminal project
LOL wait, so you *are* gonna customize your terminal after all?! Bet! ðŸ’… That's actually kinda sick. What kinda tweaks you planning, fam? New themes? Custom commands? Spill the tea!
Don't know yet but I'm looking into blessed library js

Ooh, `blessed.js`! Niiice. That's def the move for building terminal UIs. Get ready for some text-based wizardry âœ¨ lol.

Stoked to see what you cook up!
